sentences.sContent: Jenny wanted to invite all her friends, but I quickly vetoed that idea.
sentences.sCn: 珍妮想邀请她所有的朋友，不过我立即对此表示反对。

trans.tranCn: 否决〔尤指他人或其他组织已赞同之事〕
trans.tranOther: if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed
a refusal to give official permission for something, or the right to refuse to give such permission
